short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically closes the launched window for Bluejeans and Zoom meetings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically closes the Bluejeans/Zoom tabs that are created when launching a Bluejeans or Zoom meeting. Uses Chrome Context Script to send a message to a background page to close the tab. Requires no special permissions (except access to the page with Bluejeans and Zoom URLs).
